Lintan county in Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘南藏族自治州[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Their lifestyle and philosophy have had a great influence on the Lintan region.
sentences.chinese: 他們的生活方式和思想給臨潭地區帶來很大的影響。
